recipe.title: Orange-Marinated Olives
ingredients: 1 cup brine-cured olives (such as Kalamata and/or green olives)
2 tablespoons very thin matchstick-size strips orange peel
1/2 teaspoon (or more) dried crushed red pepper
instructions: Mix first 5 ingredients in small bowl. Season to taste with red pepper and salt. Cover and refrigerate overnight. (Can be prepared 4 days ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
